import React, { useState, Fragment, useEffect } from 'react'; // import { Link, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Link, withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import {connect } from 'react-redux'; import { PropTypes } from 'prop-types'; import { createProfile, getCurrentProfile } from '../../actions/profile'; const EditProfile = props => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '' }); const [displaySocialInputs, toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { props.getCurrentProfile(); setFormData({ company: props.profile.loading || !props.profile.profile.company ? '' : props.profile.company, website: props.profile.loading || !props.profile.profile.website ? '' : props.profile.website, location: props.profile.loading || !props.profile.profile.location ? '' : props.profile.location, status: props.profile.loading || !props.profile.profile.status ? '' : props.profile.status, skills: props.profile.loading || !props.profile.profile.skills ? '' : props.profile.profile.skills.join(','), githubusername: props.profile.loading || !props.profile.githubusername ? '' : props.profile.githubusername, bio: props.profile.loading || !props.profile.profile.bio ? '' : props.profile.bio, twitter: props.profile.loading || !props.profile.social.twitter ? '' : props.profile.social.twitter, facebook: props.profile.loading || !props.profile.social.facebook ? '' : props.profile.social.facebook, linkedin: props.profile.loading || !props.profile.social.linkedin ? '' : props.profile.social.linkedin, youtube: props.profile.loading || !props.profile.social.youtube ? '' : props.profile.social.youtube, instagram: props.profile.loading || !props.profile.social.instagram ? '' : props.profile.social.insocial }) }, [props.profile.loading]) const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram } = formData const onChange = e => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); props.createProfile(formData, props.history) } return (

onSubmit(e)}>
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
onChange(e))} /> Could be your own company or one you work for
onChange(e))}/> Could be your own or a company website
onChange(e))}/> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onChange(e))}/> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onChange(e))} /> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{displaySocialInputs &&
onChange(e))}/>
onChange(e))}/>
onChange(e))}/>
onChange(e))} />
onChange(e))}/>
} Go Back
); } EditProfile.propTypes = { profile: PropTypes.object.isRequired, getCurrentProfile: PropTypes.func.isRequired } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ profile: state.profile }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, { createProfile, getCurrentProfile })(withRouter(EditProfile));
